Topic.Title: New Version of L Too: A Mathemagical Adventure

Posts.EditableText:
This is a re-implementation of the 1984 game for L: A Mathemagical Adventure, available on the BBC Micro. I'd love to hear from anyone who played it or even knows anything about it.

The latest version has a number of small improvement tweaks, but the main changes are (a) an Easter Egg in the original L game has been carried across to L Too; (b) it is now possible to interact with every object mentioned. In particular, all doors can be inspected and opened; and (c) an "epilogue" has been added to give more background information on the creation of the game.
